backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types and logic for servers, rooms, posts, characters, and user profiles, including authorization checks and profile management APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence data for tracking development progress.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference or documentation generation.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling routing, auth state, profile gating, and layout wrapping.
frontend/src/components/auth/CurrentUser: Displays the current user's avatar and name or a guest badge when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time users to create a profile with minimal fields.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorNoti: Reusable destructive alert component for showing error messages.
frontend/src/components/common/RequireAu: Inline auth gate that shows a sign‑in prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout component handling navigation, header/footer, and routing via hash router.
frontend/src/components/moderation/Delet: Provides a confirmation dialog and mutation to delete a roleplay post.
frontend/src/components/moderation/Remov: Shows a confirmation dialog and triggers a mutation to remove a server member.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserPrincip: Returns the current user's principal string from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRouter.ts: Implements a simple hash-based router with path and query param parsing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout methods, and persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on servers, rooms, posts, profiles, and membership.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining custom color variables and dark mode styling.
frontend/src/lib/serverRoles.ts: Utility functions for checking user roles and permissions within a server.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
UI for listing, creating, and editing character profiles using dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/RoomViewPage.tsx: Displays a room’s details and posts, with support for creating posts, refreshing, and moderation actions.
frontend/src/pages/ServerDetailPage.tsx: Shows server info, member status, and room list, allowing joining/leaving and room creation if permitted.
frontend/src/pages/ServerDirectoryPage.t: Lists all servers and provides a dialog to create new servers if the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and edit their profile details including name and bio.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, current state, and needed image assets.
